title: Restock a Concession Stand
description: A concession stand manager reports they are running low on hot dog buns during a sold-out event.

tasks.description: Receive the request for more hot dog buns from the concession stand.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the request from Stand 14.

tasks.description: Check the inventory level of hot dog buns in the central storeroom.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms there are sufficient buns in stock.

tasks.description: Dispatch a runner to deliver two cases of buns from the storeroom to the concession stand.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates and assigns a delivery task to an available runner.
